message:
win10
Steam带https加密的网站
chrome显示：
Access Denied

You don't have permission to access "/D/935/298044/000/steamcommunity.com/login/home/?goto=0" on this server.
Reference #18.a65732b8.1453615021.221f6e36

MS的Edge显示：
地址栏：安全证书出问题 https://steamcommunity.com/login/home/?goto=0
正文：
Access Denied
You don't have permission to access "/D/935/298044/000/steamcommunity.com/login/home/?goto=0" on this server.
Reference #18.a65732b8.1453615256.2221067a

同一网络我用ipad上没有问题。不只上steam出问题，一些其他网站也有，尤其是https加密的。
菊苣门救我。
title: 请问各位菊苣怎么解决上网Access Denied的问题？
